summary: Another Dragonborn Follower based on my Savegame
descriptionHtml:
NOW FEATURED ON CREME DE LA MEME https://www.facebook.com/cremedelameme

Requirements: Skyrim 1.9, Dawnguard, Dragonborn (appearance)

This is a simple follower mod which adds a Dragonborn follower who has fullfilled his destiny long ago.

I only used Vanilla stuff so he is Lore-friendly as possible.

He can be found in High Hrothgar, has the same spells and Shouts and gear as Miraak. His Schedule is written in a Book called "Dear hero of Skyrim" where you can get all the information you need. The Book is now placed in High Hrothgar where the beds are (West Wing).

i also recommend using the unofficial patches

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23491
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25127
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31083/

Not needed for this mod, but it will make your life easier in overall.

FAQ
Q: How to Install?
A: Simply unpack the archive with 7zip or something else and drop it's contents into the data file. activate it. NMM could work too but i haven't tested that

Q:Your Grammar sucks!
A:English is not my native language and i live far away from you. perhaps the moon. lel.

Q: i have found an error, i have a suggestion etc, i want to help you so you can make dialogues
A: write it in the comments section or send me a pm i will read it when time allows me.

Q: This mod is lame!
A:[youtube]RKppY56_VIY[/youtube]

Q: Your mod is unnecessary
A: thats fine.
[youtube]xN7JTT-6ORU[/youtube]
[youtube]3_vmOvfbg90[/youtube]
[youtube]3F0Xx-oQKsU[/youtube]
author: Ananinami1

files.name: Vulkrinshul the Dragonborn Follower
files.changelogHtml: Initial Release. Given a proper Sandbox, has gear and magic. No custom voices so far

files.name: Vulkrinshul the Dragonborn Follower
files.changelogHtml:
-Fixed Spell Package. Miraaks Spell Package was Accidently altered. Restored to Vanilla. Vulkrinshul has his own Spell Package now, so no Vanilla Attributes are altered anymore.
-Removed Essential Flag. Vulkrinshul is now Protected.

files.name: Vulkrinshul the Dragonborn Follower
files.changelogHtml:
-Added Low-Level Spells too so low level Players can profit from his magical skills
-Changed Combat Style a bit so he behaves like a Spellsword +Shout
-Cleaned with TES5Edit
-Fixed the 7z File

files.name: Vulkrinshul the Dragonborn Follower
files.changelogHtml:
-Changed Combat Style again now Magic and Sword usage have the same exact amount. Hopefully this will give some balance.
-Reduced his stats a bit so he is not too powerful, but still a dangerous opponent as he is a dragonborn (Shouting will still be his best weapon)
-Added some Restoration and Alteration spells in hope that destruction is not overused.
-Cleaned again with TES5EDIT so no vanilla stuff is changed
-Changed his AI Package so he doesn't disturb the Meditation spot the Greybeards use. He should use the spots when none of the Greybeards use it right now, so he has his own schedule without interrupting the Greybeards. He has now his own AI package without sharing one with the Greybeards which makes the mod more awesome.

files.name: Vulkrinshul the Dragonborn Follower
files.changelogHtml: Added Ingame Book Called "Dear Hero of Skyrim"

files.name: Vulkrinshul the Dragonborn Follower
files.changelogHtml:
The Book "Dear Hero of Skyrim" is now placed in High Hrothgar where the beds are (West Wing).
Added some additional stuff to the Book

files.name: Vulkrinshul the Dragonborn Follower
files.changelogHtml:
Oops... Book could not be read by the player. Fixed.
After all that i checked and cleaned with TES5EDIT again to make sure no wild edits are made
